10club - Finance Associate

Location - Remote, Work Type: Full time

Finance Topfinance December 07, 2021

This role is for an experienced professional, willing to take a seat on the rocket ship that has already launched. We are an e-commerce brand acquirer, and all our operations are focused on marketplace first businesses. The candidate selected for this role will work to ensure our company’s portfolio brands are growing aggressively and out do industry benchmarks and achieve what we would call explosive growth. This is a demanding role but since you are still reading this job description, we have concluded you love a good challenge!

This journey is all about taking our acquired brand from 1x to 10x in 36 months, while maintaining healthy margins. The acquisition happens at the very beginning of their boom, so a strong empathy towards the sellers and an ability to work through the chaos of their early build is a very important aspect of this role.

Responsibilities:

  • Building a business performance view of various metrics.
  • Work with book keeping team to create the monthly MIS.
  • Provide insights on the performance of the business.
  • Envisage and implement control processes that enable accurate and timely reporting of monthly performance.
  • 2-3 years of Experience and understanding of e-commerce industry in India is preferred.
  • Logical and process oriented mindset.

Requirements:

Apply

10club - Director Operations

Director of Operations is a leadership role and the incumbent would be supporting the Growth Team on all operational aspects of the brand plans across marketplaces. The Director of Operations would work very closely with resellers and ensure that the reseller systems, processes and operations are in line with the brand growth strategy.
